selectPermissionsForm.facilityPermission: Báwo ni wa ṣe maa lo Kolibri? (O lè ṣàdáni àwọn ààtò yíì bóyá)
Àwọn ìwifún si nípa àwọn ààtò yíì
selectPermissionsForm.adminManagedSetupD: Fún àwọn ilé ẹ̀kọ́ àti fọ́mátì ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ìṣètò kíkà míìràn
selectPermissionsForm.selfManagedSetupDe: Fún àwọn ibi-ìpamọ́ ìwé, ilé àwọn aláìlóbì, ẹ̀wọ̀n, aarín àwọn ọ̀dọ́, láàbù kọ̀m̀pútà, àti àwọn ohun àìní-fọ́mátì ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ìṣètò kíkà mìíràn
selectPermissionsForm.informalSetupDescr: Fún ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ òbí-ọmọ, ilé ẹ̀kọ́ ilé, tàbí àfikun ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ẹlẹ́ni kọ̀ọ̀kan
selectPermissionsForm.enabledUserAccount: Àlejò lè ṣẹ̀dá àkọọ́lẹ̀ ti wọn
selectPermissionsForm.disabledUserAccoun: Àwọn alákóso gbọ́dọ̀ ṣẹ̀dá gbogbo àkoólẹ̀ olùṣàmúlò
selectPermissionsForm.enabledAccountEdit: Olùṣàmúlò lè ṣàtúnṣe ìwifún àkoólẹ̀ wọn
selectPermissionsForm.disabledAccountEdi: Olùṣàmúlò kò le ṣàtúnṣe ìwifún àkoólẹ̀ wọn
selectPermissionsForm.enabledUserPasswor: Olùṣàmúlò lè wọlé láìgba ọ̀rọ̀ aṣínà
selectPermissionsForm.enabledUserSelfSig: Àlejò lè ṣẹ̀dá àkọọ́lẹ̀ ti wọn
selectPermissionsForm.disabledUserSelfSi: Àwọn alákóso gbọ́dọ̀ ṣẹ̀dá gbogbo àkoólẹ̀ olùṣàmúlò
superuserCredentialsForm.adminAccountCre: Àkọọ́lẹ̀ yìí gbà ọ́ láàyè láti ṣàbojutó ohun elò rẹ àti àkoonú orí ohun elò yìí.
superuserCredentialsForm.usernameCharact: Orúkọ olùṣàmúlò gbọ́dọ̀ ní àwọn lẹ́tà, nọ́ḿbà, àti ìlà abẹ́ nìkan
facilityNameForm.facilityNamingFormDescr: ''Ohun-elò'' ni ibi tí o ń Ṣàgbékalẹ̀ Kolibri si, bíi ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ tàbí ibi ìkọ́ni
facilityNameForm.facilityNameFieldMaxLen: Ohun elò kòle ju bíi ọgọ́rùn ẹyọ ọ̀rọ̀
defaultLanguageForm.languageFormHeader: Jọ̀wọ́ yan èdè àkùnàyàn fún Kolibri
onboardingErrorPage.errorPageSubheader: Jọ̀wọ́ ṣàyẹ̀wò àpèsè ìsopọ̀ rẹ kí o tún gbìyànjú.
onboardingErrorPage.errorPageAdditionalG: Bí ìgbìyànjú ò bá ṣiṣẹ́, tún apèsè tàn kí o tún ojú ewé sọdọ̀tun.
onboardingLoadingPage.loadingPageSubhead: Jọ̀wọ́ ní sùúrù. Àgbékalẹ̀ lè gba àwọn ìṣẹjú díẹ̀
